description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Beachfront adapter
title: Beachfront Adapter Params

___videoResponseType.description: By default the video response will be a nurl URL, but if you want AdM/VAST, set this to 'adm'. If you want both set it to 'both'. Setting it to any other string will have no effect and the default format will be returned.

___bidfloor.description: The price floor for the bid.

___appId.description: The id of an inventory target. This can only be used in requests that contain one media type. It will be applied to all imps in the request.

___appIds.description: An object that specifies appIds for specific media types. This can be used for either single media type requests or multiple.

___video.description: An appId string that will be applied to video requests in this imp.

___banner.description: An appId string that will be applied to banner requests in this imp.
